mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, com_NUM,com_WRITER, com_CONTENT, com_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, com_RENAME_FILENAME, com_DATE, com_LEV, com_REF, com_REPLY_REF, com_REPLY_SEQ, com_READCOUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM com ORDER BY com_REF DESC, com_REPLY_REF DESC, com_LEV ASC, com_REPLY_SEQ ASC)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into community (com_num,com_writer, com_content, com_original_filename, com_rename_filename, com_date, com_lev, com_ref, com_reply_ref, com_reply_seq, com_readcount) values ((select max(com_num) + 1 from community ), #{com_writer},#{com_content},#{com_original_filename}, #{com_rename_filename}, sysdate, 1, (select max(com_num) + 1 from community ), default, default, default)

insert into community (com_num, com_writer, com_content, com_original_filename, com_rename_filename, com_date, com_lev, com_ref, com_reply_ref, com_reply_seq, com_readcount) values ((select max(com_num) + 1 from community ), #{com_writer},#{com_content}, null, null, sysdate, 2, #{com_ref}, (select max(com_num) + 1 from community ), #{com_reply_seq}, default)

insert into community (com_num, com_writer, com_content, com_original_filename, com_rename_filename, com_date, com_lev, com_ref, com_reply_ref, com_reply_seq, com_readcount) values ((select max(com_num) + 1 from community ), #{com_writer},#{com_content}, null, null, sysdate, 3, #{com_ref}, #{com_reply_ref}, #{com_reply_seq}, default)
